A great example of what it is like to live on an Italian farm .

The property is approximately 1,000 acres and has wildboar , horses , bovine , daini ( small deer ) , foxes , porcupines , turtles , many species of rare Italian birds , pine forests , swamp land , and natural fresh water and salt water beaches .
, Via IV Novembre n° 61 Marina di Grosseto , fax : +39056434607 .

It offers bedrooms , studio apartments and one bedroom apartments all in the same building .
All accommodations are sunny and welcoming , with all modern comforts : ensuite bathroom , telephone , terraces , air conditioning , safe and central heating .
